app_desc: Elevate your lifestyle with our concierge, offering personalized services and extraordinary experiences.
under_dev_desc: We're still working on this feature. Please check back later.
loading_desc: Hang on a sec...we are setting up your personalized experience
phone_auth_error_desc: We are unable to verify your phone number. Please try again later.
auth_error_desc: There was an error authenticating you. Please try again later.
phone_auth_header: Sign in with your phone number
phone_auth_desc: We will send you a one time SMS message to verify your phone number. No carrier charges applied
auth_sign_in_with_phone: Sign in with your phone number
phone_auth_code_sent_desc: Please enter the 6 digit code sent to your phone number
sign_out_desc: Are you sure you want to sign out?
change_username_desc: Your username is how our experts will see you on Swiftly
user_profile: Please enter your details to start your personalized experience
user_profile_desc: You will use this email and password to log into your account
profile_sign_in_message: Are you a new user? Please sign in to enjoy all the features of our app.

errors.auth_error_message: There was an error authenticating you. Please try again later.
errors.phone_auth_error: Sorry, we could not verify your phone number. Please try again later.
errors.error_occurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.countries_not_found: There are no countries available at the moment. Please try again later.
errors.invalid_phone_number: The phone number is badly formatted. Please check and try again
errors.countries_error_message: There was an error fetching the list of countries. Please try again later.
errors.something_went_wrong: Oops.. something went wrong. Please try again later.
